function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fast and unstoppable disease transmission due to high human mobility","Impact":"Widespread and rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology, and vaccine development","People":"General public, travelers, and individuals in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Overload of hospitals and quarantine facilities","Impact":"Decreased capacity for providing medical care and isolation","Mitigation":"Expand healthcare infrastructure, improve hospital management, and increase quarantine facilities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices, and hospital management software","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and individuals in need of medical care","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, and medical equipment suppliers"},{"Description":"Changing living styles and uncertain conditions leading to the need for infectious disease-friendly building designs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Incorporate ventilation systems, antimicrobial materials, and spatial distancing measures into building designs","Technologies":"Air purification systems, antimicrobial coatings, and sensor-based occupancy monitoring","People":"Architects, urban planners, and building occupants","Owner":"Architectural firms, construction companies, and building owners"}]}
